items.title: Introduction to Deep Learning
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of deep learning and its applications

items.title: Overview of Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
items.description: This lesson provides an overview of advanced machine learning techniques, including ensemble methods and transfer learning

items.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of CNNs, including convolutional layers, pooling layers, and fully connected layers

items.title: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) Networks
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of RNNs and LSTMs, including their applications in natural language processing and time series forecasting

items.title: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Variational Autoencoders (VAEs)
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of GANs and VAEs, including their applications in image and video generation

items.title: Attention Mechanisms and Transformers
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of attention mechanisms and transformers, including their applications in natural language processing and computer vision

items.title: Explainable AI (XAI) and Model Interpretability
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of XAI and model interpretability, including techniques for explaining and interpreting machine learning models

items.title: Adversarial Robustness and Security
items.description: This lesson covers the basics of adversarial robustness and security, including techniques for defending against adversarial attacks

items.title: Machine Learning in Computer Vision
items.description: This lesson covers the applications of machine learning in computer vision, including image classification, object detection, and segmentation

items.title: Machine Learning in Natural Language Processing
items.description: This lesson covers the applications of machine learning in natural language processing, including text classification, sentiment analysis, and language translation
